Class com.heaton.bot.Log 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class com.heaton.bot.Log 

Object
   |
   +----com.heaton.bot.Log
public class Log
extends Object
The log class is used to write out log information.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton

LOG_LEVEL_DUMP
Display the greatest amort of log information all info packets will be displayed.
LOG_LEVEL_ERROR
Log only errors.
LOG_LEVEL_NONE
Log nothing.
LOG_LEVEL_NORMAL
Normal level of logging.
LOG_LEVEL_TRACE
Display enough information so that the operation of the program could be traced.
_level
What level to log to.
_log2console
Are we logging to the console?
_log2file
Are we logging to a file.
_path
The path of the log file.

getConsole()
Get if console logging is enabled.
getFile()
Determine if file logging is being used.
getLevel()
Get the current logging level.
getPath()
The log file path.
log(int, String)
Used to actually log an event.
logException(String, Exception)
Log an exception.
setConsole(boolean)
Determines if console logging is enabled.
setFile(boolean)
Determines if file logging is enabled.
setLevel(int)
Set the logging level.
setPath(String)
Set the path to log to.

LOG_LEVEL_DUMP 
public static final int LOG_LEVEL_DUMP
Display the greatest amort of log information all info packets will be displayed.

LOG_LEVEL_ERROR 
public static final int LOG_LEVEL_ERROR
Log only errors.

LOG_LEVEL_NONE 
public static final int LOG_LEVEL_NONE
Log nothing.

LOG_LEVEL_NORMAL 
public static final int LOG_LEVEL_NORMAL
Normal level of logging.

LOG_LEVEL_TRACE 
public static final int LOG_LEVEL_TRACE
Display enough information so that the operation of the program could be traced.

_level 
protected static int _level
What level to log to.

_log2console 
protected static boolean _log2console
Are we logging to the console?

_log2file 
protected static boolean _log2file
Are we logging to a file.

_path 
protected static java.lang.String _path
The path of the log file.

getConsole 
public static boolean getConsole()
Get if console logging is enabled.

Returns:
Returns true if console logging is enabled.
getFile 
public static boolean getFile()
Determine if file logging is being used.

Returns:
True if file logging is enabled.
getLevel 
public static int getLevel()
Get the current logging level.

Returns:
The current logging level.
getPath 
public static java.lang.String getPath()
The log file path.

Returns:
The log file path.
log 
public static synchronized void log(int level,
                                    String event)
Used to actually log an event.

Parameters:
level - The level of this event.
event - The text to be logged.
logException 
public static void logException(String event,
                                Exception e)
Log an exception.

Parameters:
event - The text to describe this log event.
e - The exception.
setConsole 
public static void setConsole(boolean b)
Determines if console logging is enabled.

Parameters:
b - True if console logging is enabled.
setFile 
public static void setFile(boolean b)
Determines if file logging is enabled.

setLevel 
public static void setLevel(int l)
Set the logging level.

Parameters:
l - The logging level.
setPath 
public static void setPath(String s)
Set the path to log to.

Parameters:
s - The path to log to.
